title: Terminal velocity
creator_credit: Deran Sarafian, Tom Engelman, Scott Kroopf, Buena Vista and Hollywood Pictures
brief_description: All is not what it seems in this action thriller starring Charlie Sheen as the hard-playing reckless skydiving teacher, Ditch Brodie, who finds himself asking questions when his beautiful new student Chris Morrow (Nastassja Kinski) mysteriously meets with a tragic accident on her first jump. Suspense and intrigue follow as Brodie accused of manslaughter is caught up in international espionage involving the Russian mafia. Cast includes James Gandolfini, Chris McDonald.
